fields.headline: Cricket World Cup Show
fields.bodyText: Rob Curling's back, with Rob Smyth, Andy Bull, Scott Anthony and Lawrence Booth, to discuss all the latest from the Super 8s. With Australia beating the West Indies and a South Africa v Sri Lanka thriller in Guyana, there's much for the chaps to mull over on the Cricket World Cup Show. Blog your comments on what you've been seeing... and hearing... below. Click here to listen now on your computer. Click here to subscribe free, via iTunes, and get the latest episode on your iPod. For the Cricket World Cup Show podcast feed, click here.
